scripts.watch: $(npm bin)/mjml -o dist -w templates/*.mjml & $(npm bin)/browser-sync -w dist dist
scripts.deploy: ORIGIN="$(git remote get-url origin)" && rm -rf dist/.git && npm run build && cd dist && git init && git add . && git commit -m "deploy $(date -I)" && git remote add origin "$ORIGIN" && git push --force origin main:gh-pages
